pli-tv-bi-vb-pj7:1.1: Tena samayena buddho bhagavā sāvatthiyaṃ viharati jetavane anāthapiṇḍikassa ārāme.
pli-tv-bi-vb-pj7:1.2: Tena kho pana samayena thullanandā bhikkhunī samaggena saṃghena ukkhittaṃ ariṭṭhaṃ bhikkhuṃ gaddhabādhipubbaṃ anuvattati.
pli-tv-bi-vb-pj7:1.3: Yā tā bhikkhuniyo appicchā …pe… tā ujjhāyanti khiyyanti vipācenti—
pli-tv-bi-vb-pj7:1.4: “kathañhi nāma ayyā thullanandā samaggena saṃghena ukkhittaṃ ariṭṭhaṃ bhikkhuṃ gaddhabādhipubbaṃ anuvattissatī”ti …pe…
pli-tv-bi-vb-pj7:1.5: “saccaṃ kira, bhikkhave, thullanandā bhikkhunī samaggena saṃghena ukkhittaṃ ariṭṭhaṃ bhikkhuṃ gaddhabādhipubbaṃ anuvattatī”ti?
pli-tv-bi-vb-pj7:1.8: kathañhi nāma, bhikkhave, thullanandā bhikkhunī samaggena saṃghena ukkhittaṃ ariṭṭhaṃ bhikkhuṃ gaddhabādhipubbaṃ anuvattissati.
pli-tv-bi-vb-pj7:1.10: evañca pana, bhikkhave, bhikkhuniyo imaṃ sikkhāpadaṃ uddisantu—
pli-tv-bi-vb-pj7:1.11: “Yā pana bhikkhunī samaggena saṃghena ukkhittaṃ bhikkhuṃ dhammena vinayena satthusāsanena anādaraṃ appaṭikāraṃ akatasahāyaṃ tamanuvatteyya, sā bhikkhunī bhikkhunīhi evamassa vacanīyā—
pli-tv-bi-vb-pj7:1.12: ‘eso kho, ayye, bhikkhu samaggena saṃghena ukkhitto dhammena vinayena satthusāsanena anādaro appaṭikāro akatasahāyo, māyye, etaṃ bhikkhuṃ anuvattī’ti.
pli-tv-bi-vb-pj7:1.13: Evañca sā bhikkhunī bhikkhunīhi vuccamānā tatheva paggaṇheyya, sā bhikkhunī bhikkhunīhi yāvatatiyaṃ samanubhāsitabbā tassa paṭinissaggāya.
pli-tv-bi-vb-pj7:1.14: Yāvatatiyañce samanubhāsiyamānā taṃ paṭinissajjeyya, iccetaṃ kusalaṃ.
pli-tv-bi-vb-pj7:1.15: No ce paṭinissajjeyya, ayampi pārājikā hoti asaṃvāsā ukkhittānuvattikā”ti.
pli-tv-bi-vb-pj7:2.1.8: āpattiyā adassane vā appaṭikamme vā appaṭinissagge vā ukkhitto.
pli-tv-bi-vb-pj7:2.1.14: saṃghaṃ vā gaṇaṃ vā puggalaṃ vā kammaṃ vā nādiyati.
pli-tv-bi-vb-pj7:2.1.19: So tehi saddhiṃ natthi, tena vuccati akatasahāyoti.
pli-tv-bi-vb-pj7:2.1.21: yaṃdiṭṭhiko so hoti yaṃkhantiko yaṃruciko, sāpi taṃdiṭṭhikā hoti taṃkhantikā taṃrucikā.
pli-tv-bi-vb-pj7:2.1.25: aññāhi bhikkhunīhi. Yā passanti yā suṇanti tāhi vattabbā—
pli-tv-bi-vb-pj7:2.1.26: “eso kho, ayye, bhikkhu samaggena saṃghena ukkhitto dhammena vinayena satthusāsanena anādaro appaṭikāro akatasahāyo.
pli-tv-bi-vb-pj7:2.1.34: “eso kho, ayye, bhikkhu samaggena saṃghena ukkhitto dhammena vinayena satthusāsanena anādaro appaṭikāro akatasahāyo.
pli-tv-bi-vb-pj7:2.1.44: Ayaṃ itthannāmā bhikkhunī samaggena saṃghena ukkhittaṃ bhikkhuṃ dhammena vinayena satthusāsanena anādaraṃ appaṭikāraṃ akatasahāyaṃ tamanuvattati, sā taṃ vatthuṃ na paṭinissajjati.
pli-tv-bi-vb-pj7:2.1.45: Yadi saṃghassa pattakallaṃ, saṃgho itthannāmaṃ bhikkhuniṃ samanubhāseyya tassa vatthussa paṭinissaggāya.
pli-tv-bi-vb-pj7:2.1.48: Ayaṃ itthannāmā bhikkhunī samaggena saṃghena ukkhittaṃ bhikkhuṃ dhammena vinayena satthusāsanena anādaraṃ appaṭikāraṃ akatasahāyaṃ tamanuvattati.
pli-tv-bi-vb-pj7:2.1.50: Saṃgho itthannāmaṃ bhikkhuniṃ samanubhāsati tassa vatthussa paṭinissaggāya.
pli-tv-bi-vb-pj7:2.1.51: Yassā ayyāya khamati itthannāmāya bhikkhuniyā samanubhāsanā tassa vatthussa paṭinissaggāya, sā tuṇhassa;
pli-tv-bi-vb-pj7:2.1.55: Samanubhaṭṭhā saṃghena itthannāmā bhikkhunī tassa vatthussa paṭinissaggāya.
pli-tv-bi-vb-pj7:2.1.56: Khamati saṃghassa, tasmā tuṇhī, evametaṃ dhārayāmī’”ti.
pli-tv-bi-vb-pj7:2.1.63: seyyathāpi nāma puthusilā dvedhā bhinnā appaṭisandhikā hoti, evameva bhikkhunī yāvatatiyaṃ samanubhāsanāya na paṭinissajjantī assamaṇī hoti asakyadhītā. Tena vuccati pārājikā hotīti.
pli-tv-bi-vb-pj7:2.1.65: saṃvāso nāma ekakammaṃ ekuddeso samasikkhatā. Eso saṃvāso nāma.
pli-tv-bi-vb-pj7:2.1.66: So tāya saddhiṃ natthi. Tena vuccati asaṃvāsāti.
pli-tv-bi-vb-pj7:2.2.1: Dhammakamme dhammakammasaññā na paṭinissajjati, āpatti pārājikassa.
pli-tv-bi-vb-pj7:2.2.2: Dhammakamme vematikā na paṭinissajjati, āpatti pārājikassa.
pli-tv-bi-vb-pj7:2.2.3: Dhammakamme adhammakammasaññā na paṭinissajjati, āpatti pārājikassa.
